adDetails: Guaranteed to make & save you money! I am licensed to cover the entire state of California. Listings, Buyers, Sellers, Investors, International Investors, For Sale by Owners, Cash Buyers, Divorces, Bereavement, Etc. I have a Real Estate Broker's License & an MBA. (I am not just a Real Estate Sales Agent) I have the authority to be more flexible and accommodating for my clients. I can provide you past clients as a referral source. (Upon Request) They will be able to share with you their experience throughout the entire process & how my services assisted in making their experience a positive one. Because of my 20-years of business history, I know how to weed out the minutia while identifying what is relevant in completing transactions. Time is most important on a personal & professional level. Utilizing me as your Real Estate Broker/Agent will save you time & save you money! Please contact me, Arnie Arenas, MBA show contact info
